text: @realDonaldTrump @realDonaldTrump Trust me we know your not nice & do things your way. That's the problem. This clip basically says as soon as you figured out you were wrong about COVID19 you "sprung" into action two months too late. Would have been better if you had paid attention in Dec 2019.
